apr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

apr

The goal of apr is to bring the goodness of APL to R. R provides multidimensional arrays out of the box, but many of the table stakes for array programming are missing. This package seeks to fill that gap.

Installation

You can install the development version of apr like so:

pak::pak("11rchitwood/apr")

APL Glyph Implementation Plan

The following sections group APL glyphs into categories and then list their corresponding monadic and dyadic function names in the apr package. Note: “—” indicates that the glyph does not have a standard monadic or dyadic form in APL.

Shape

Source | Tests

  • ⍴ (apr_shape, apr_reshape)
  • ⍳ (apr_iota, apr_index_of)
  • ↑ (apr_first, apr_take)
  • ↓ (—, apr_drop)

Structural

Source | Tests

  • ⍉ (apr_transpose, apr_transpose_axes)
  • ⌽ (apr_reverse, apr_rotate)
  • ⊖ (apr_reverse_first, apr_rotate_first)
  • , (apr_ravel, apr_catenate)
  • ⍪ (apr_table, apr_catenate_first)

Functional

Source | Tests

  • / (—, apr_reduce)
  • ⌿ (—, apr_reduce_first)
  • \ (apr_expand, apr_scan)
  • ⍀ (apr_expand_first, apr_scan_first)

Set Operations

Source | Tests

  • ∊ (apr_enlist, apr_membership)
  • ∩ (—, apr_intersection)
  • ∪ (apr_unique, apr_union)

Sorting

Source | Tests

  • ⍋ (apr_grade_up, apr_bins_up)
  • ⍒ (apr_grade_down, apr_bins_down)

Nesting

Source | Tests

  • ⊂ (apr_enclose, apr_partition)
  • ⊃ (apr_disclose, apr_pick)
  • ≡ (apr_depth, apr_match)
  • ≢ (apr_tally, apr_not_match)

Encoding

Source | Tests

  • ⊥ (—, apr_decode)
  • ⊤ (—, apr_encode)

Arithmetic

Source | Tests

    • (apr_conjugate, apr_plus)
  • − (apr_negate, apr_minus)
  • × (apr_signum, apr_times)
  • ÷ (apr_reciprocal, apr_divide)
  • | (apr_abs, apr_mod)
    • (apr_exp, apr_power)

Mathematical

Source | Tests

  • ⌈ (apr_ceiling, apr_max)
  • ⌊ (apr_floor, apr_min)
  • ○ (apr_pi_times, apr_circular)
  • ⍟ (apr_ln, apr_log)
  • ? (apr_roll, apr_deal)

Matrix

Source | Tests

  • ⌹ (apr_matrix_inverse, apr_matrix_divide)

Comparison

Source | Tests

  • < (—, apr_less)

  • ≤ (—, apr_less_equal)

  • = (—, apr_equal)

  • ≥ (—, apr_greater_equal)

  • (—, apr_greater)

  • ≠ (—, apr_not_equal)

Logic

Source | Tests

  • ∧ (—, apr_lcm)
  • ∨ (—, apr_gcd)
  • ⍱ (—, apr_nand)
  • ⍲ (—, apr_nor)

Selection

Source | Tests

  • ⊣ (apr_identity, apr_left)
  • ⊢ (apr_identity, apr_right)
  • ⍸ (apr_where, apr_interval_index)

Formatting

Source | Tests

  • ⍎ (apr_execute, —)
  • ⍕ (apr_format, apr_format_precision)
